title: Social Housing Sales
description: Information about the sales of local authority and registered social landlords (RSL) dwellings.
datasetNotes: Data found on the landing page by scrolling to the  latest release and clicking on the link.c  Scroll down the page to Data and click on the + click on Social housing sales link , there are 3 x meta data  (orange Icon) and 3 x reports (clicking on the title links)
sizingNotes: Available through the odata route, so simple to get, but may need a number of separate downloads / produce a number of different datasets, so needs a fair amount of up-front analysis
notes: The stats are produced in Power BI, the dimensions have not been collected as the information will be available in a different format. The dataset has been divided into 3
